name: Don't Let Death Takes Us Apart
name_original: Don't Let Death Takes Us Apart
description:
This game was developed by Golden Rocket Games to participate in the 3rd Gdevelop Game Jam.  Where the theme was SEPARATION.  If Slow, download the desktop version, in a few days the android version will be up too.

Developers:

Milton Oliveira

Wiliam Oliveira

Joice Oliveira

"YOU USE THE KEYBOARD ARROW KEYS TO MOVE THE PLAYER WITHIN THE GAME AREA."

"AS YOU RUN AWAY FROM DEATH,  SOME POTIONS WILL APPEAR. 

THE POTIONS OF DEATH (ONLY SHE TAKES):

RED: SHE GAINS 10 SPEED POWER.

YELLOW: CREATES A LAVA THAT IF THE PLAYER COMES INTO CONTACT WITH IT HE WILL DIE.

BLUE: CREATES A FLOOD, SLOWING PLAYER SPEED."

"PLAYER'S POTIONS

GREEN: LIGHTNING STRIKES AND HE GAINS 10 SPEED POWER.

PINK: HE SENDS DEATH TO THE

THRONE AND SLOWS HER 10 SPEED POWER.

BLUE: FREEZES DEATH FOR 5 SECONDS.

USE THE A, S and D KEYS TO ACTIVE THEM."
